--- Shane Mingins <shanemingins@...> wrote:
> No I don't speak German.  Is that last book a book
> on
> Ward Cunningham's FIT?  I am so looking forward to
> Rick and Ward's FIT booking due out next month.  And
> Rick is a fellow kiwi!

I didn't knew that he will publish a book. I will read
it too.

> 
> > 
> > To become a master of JUnit it takes years of
> > practice, although it is easy to learn the basics.
> 
> Like most things.  I always remember the phrase on
> my
> Othello game  ... "a moment to learn a lifetime to
> master"

Yes. But it is not so common as one might think. There
are frameworks, development processes and tools which
are hard to learn and cannot be mastered... To make a
thing simpler but not simple (like JUnit) requires a
lot of intelligence and knowledge, which is not common.
